description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Modal' that renders a modal dialog with optional footer content. It manages open/close states and handles Escape key closure via an effect hook.

methods.name: Modal({ open, title, children, onClose, footer })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a modal dialog, handling open state, titles, children content, footer, and closure mechanisms.
